column5: Does Lebaron still have their no tax sale any more.. Or Did I miss it?
I know that October had a no tax event
Usually during the Sportsman Show and perhaps Spring Fishing Show

Was there earlier today to return an item that I had purchased 3 weeks ago.. They gave me some slack on their 10 day refund/exchange policy, but I was good with just a credit note or offering to buy some tackle (which I don't really need) for the refund..  Anyway, they ended up giving me a full refund.. I was surprised and shocked...  Thank You..  While there 2 weeks ago, we were looking at the electronics and my buddy commented on the Lowrance Elite 7 being $1.00 less that Bass Pro  $768.00...   Well today while waiting to see if they were going to give me a refund, I walked over to the same unit and it was marked  with a big orange tag "SPECIAL" $728.00...  Are they serious ??  Guess they are getting ready for their no tax event...   I sure won't be there..  Tiz
I think it is now priced at 728 due to the new calender year,  which also means new catalogue and new pricing. That's just my assumption..
I'm still trying to figure out what the issue is that it was a dollar cheaper than BPS.. and now it's $41 cheaper than BPS??! and he won't be there..
I'm still trying to figure out what the issue is that it was a dollar cheaper than BPS.. and now it's $41 cheaper than BPS??! and he won't be there.. Shhhhhhhhhh!!! It's a coded message Wayne.
I'm still trying to figure out what the issue is that it was a dollar cheaper than BPS.. and now it's $41 cheaper than BPS??! and he won't be there..  LOL same

I'm still trying to figure out what the issue is that it was a dollar cheaper than BPS.. and now it's $41 cheaper than BPS??! and he won't be there..  I think he is implying that since the "tax free event" only applies to items not already on sale, that they purposely reduce big ticket items before the sale... Just a guess...
AH... now I get it.. marked down 5 so they don't have to give you 13... kinda like a snake oil salesman..gottcha !

Sorry all.. it was a typo error... They have priced it at $828.00... All I was implying is that 3 weeks ago it was $758.00 and now it's $70.00 more.. They said that Lowrance increased the price on the Elite 7 Gold combos..  Sorry for the mix up...  Tiz

it would be interesting to know what bps has it on for  now .  I`ve been trying to contact lowrance about getting a hds hat  however the email thing  has not been going well. It seem they only have one style hat for sale to US customers.  :wallbash:
Was there yesterday as well... $769.00 for the Elite 7 Gold....   $739.00 for Humminbird 859c HD DI which is comparable....
Lowrance did raise the costs to dealers
No tax event starts feb 5th according to website
yup got an email, no tax sale
Trying to decide if Sportsman Show is worthwhile  $19 admission plus parking  LeBaron no tax sale Feb 5 -23.
